Name: Base Station License, 3 Brothers Car Service Inc.
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by 3 Brothers Car Service Inc. for a license to operate a new base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by 3 Brothers Car Service Inc. also known as 3 Brothers Car Service, 3 Brothers Car Service Inc and 3 Brothers Car Service, Inc for a license to operate a new base station at 316 Ralph Avenue in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#2141
9/1/1999
